description:
In this course titled 'Hypnosis- Control Bed Wetting With Self Hypnosis' By Pradeep Aggarwal , you will learn -

  • 1. What is bedwetting? a. Bedwetting, medically known as nocturnal enuresis (NE), is a common pediatric issue that can follow children into their early teens. Bedwetting can have significant impact on a child or adolescent's life. b. One may feel sad, ashamed, and embarrassed. He or she may worry that she might have an accident while sleeping at a friend's home or while away at overnight camp. 2. Emotional or Psychological Factors responsible for bedwetting: a. Emotional distress b. Emotional conflict c. Emotional Stress 3. How Self Hypnosis Can Help? 1) Self hypnosis is a method that focuses on relaxing and improving one's self-control and independence. 2) Self hypnosis increases self esteem 3) Self hypnosis helps you to relax and calm down 4) Self hypnosis helps maintain positive attitude Self hypnosis treats stress, anxiety, nervousness and depression successfully
  • It is for everyone who are suffering from the problem of bed wetting which they have picked up psychologically during their childhood and want to overcome it to avoid embarrassment and become more successful

It is also very helpful for people who want to get over depression , anxiety , insomnia , negativity and stress.

This course contains a lot of exercises and more than 30 minutes of live video content designed over 8 lectures in English including bonuses.

This course contains-

Lecture 1: Introduction

Lecture 2: Remove Myths About Self Hypnosis

Lecture 3: Conscious Mind Vs Subconscious Mind

Lecture 4: How To Enter Into The State Of Self Hypnosis

Lecture 5: How To Master Self Hypnosis To Reprogram Your Subconscious Mind

Lecture 6: Guided Visualization Exercise: To Control Bed Wetting

Lecture 7: Summary

Lecture 8: Bonus Exercise - Affirmations For Depression, Stress, Insomnia And Negativity
title: Hypnosis- Control Bed Wetting With Self Hypnosis
